description:
After being teased by his classmates about his drawings of UFOs and UMAs, Shouta meets the Digimon Ekakimon that has the ability to turn drawings to reality.  With Shouta’s powerful imagination, the school is in danger of being overrun by fearsome monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Gathering of UFOs and Dinosaurs! Ekakimon of Dreams
UFO Kyouryuu Daishuugou! Yume no Ekakimon
UFO・恐竜大集合! 夢のエカキモン
